plot: When a man videotapes a fatal assault where bystanders watch and don't intervene, he finds himself haunted by the guilt of his own inaction, and by something far more insidious.
title: Good Samaritan
plot_es: When a man videotapes a fatal assault where bystanders watch and don't intervene, he finds himself haunted by the guilt of his own inaction, and by something far more insidious.
plot_en: When a man videotapes a fatal assault where bystanders watch and don't intervene, he finds himself haunted by the guilt of his own inaction, and by something far more insidious.
